features: 【NECK PAIN,STOP!SLEEPLESS NIGHTS ARE GONE】Don't hesitate, sleepless nights will be over, a new ergonomic pillow with US patent is for you,compared to others, CHxxy neck pillow has thickened neck contour, improved hollow centre , neck massage point,conforms to the natural curvature of the neck and shoulder perfectly, allowing the cervical spine to be more efficiently supported, stretched and relaxed. A 70% reduction in body pressure and muscle tension maintains good blood flow to the head.

【ADJUSTABLE: ENJOY A PERSONALIZED SLEEP STYLE】The wrong height leads to headaches, back shoulder and neck pain, sleep apnea and snoring，CHxxy uses two different thicknesses for a custom feel. Simply rotate your pillow 180 degrees to enjoy a higher or lower contour! The removable insert at the bottom also provides more height freedom.

【ENJOY BEST REST!RELAX WHOLE BODY MUSCLES】CHxxy cervical neck pillow provide comfortable soft touch+full support+keep all time shape,The premium foam can absorb head pressure ,allow your neck and head to completely relax and eliminate tension and stress, so you can quickly enter a sleep state.

【A SWEET SLEEP ALL NIGHT REJOICE!】The neck support pillow made of Ice Silk fabric,offer the best of comfort and heat dissipation quickly,It is gentle on your skin to stay crisp throughout the night,breathable pillowcases removable & machine washable.You can rest assured that all our neck support pillows are CertiPUR-US and Oeko-Tex approved,without any harmful substance!

【HASSLE FREE AFTER-SALES SUPPORT - NO NEED TO RETURN!】It is the perfect healthy gift. Choose this great neck pillow for pain relief, and you may find your sleep quality improves unexpectedly. We stand behind our quality products and customer service. If you are not satisfied with the product, just contact our customer service, no questions asked, you will get the solution immediately!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Have you been looking for a supportive and comfortable pillow？CHxxy cervical pillow is your best choice. Original Design:Perfectly supports and aligns your head,neck,shoulder and back.You will fall asleep faster and deeper. Relieve Pressure and Help Sleep:Original physiological curve design completely relaxes the head, neck and shoulder muscles and nerves.premium memory foam always keep soft and supportive. Scientific Neck Protection:The physiological curve design of the head and neck perfectly supports the head and cervical vertebra, and relaxes the muscles and nerves of the head, neck and shoulder.

The neck both sides slope ensuring that you can always maintain the most correct natural posture,middle concave can fit to take care of the neck and the back of the head,while leaving a space for the nose,doesn't suffocate your nose,and make you breathe better and smoothly,two armrests are designed so that arm muscles will not feel pressure.

Pillows for Back Sleepers: Use the sides of the pillow. Natural neck traction to support a hanging head and soothing stretching of the cervical spine throughout the night. Pillows for side Sleepers: Use the side wings of the pillow and place your hands on the armrests. Support the neck and shoulders, support to keep the cervical spine and spine at the same level. Pillows for Stomach Sleepers: Rest both of your shoulders and arms on the stomach sleeper pillows, it will ensure that your neck does not feel stiff and better stretch of shoulders.

THIS PILLOW IS NOT A MEDICAL PRODUCT,IF YOU WHAT TO USE IT FOR MEDICAL REHABILITATION, PLEASE ASK A PROFESSIONAL DOCTOR AND DECIDE WHETHER TO BUY IT ACCORDING TO THE DOCTOR'S ADVICE.CHxxy Memory foam pillow can only be helpful for improving sleeping quality, can’t be used for diagnosis or treatment of any disease. Warm Tips: 1. The memory foam will have a very slight smell of polyurethane, if you are unacceptable, please ventilate 3-5 days. 2. You can experience some discomfort within the first week, and your body tries to adjust to the correct location. Please be patient and give yourself an adaptation cycle. 3. Due to the inherent characteristics of the memory foam, the received pillow will change seasonal hardness and softness, but it does not affect noring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It truly works
reviews.reviewText: I've been using my pillow for about 2 weeks now and I have had neck problems for years. I can tell you with no uncertainty that this is the best pillow I have ever used. Unlike some people it was comfortable and made me feel better literally the first night. I actually wake up more rested and realize that I am sleeping through the night. I'll never use regular pillows again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable, helps support spine and neck, most comfortable pillow that I have ever used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works and I’m fussy about pillows
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical but have been going through pillows for decades never finding consistency or one brand/style to stick with. The department store pillows don’t last long and are inconsistent. This pillow was, for me, taking a chance on something ugly and potentially uncomfortable. However, after about two weeks of use, I’m still happy with it. Two months from now, ¿quién sabe?It’s a tad ugly as mentioned but a standard pillow case fits on it with no loss of functionality. That helps.It has a bit of a chemical smell at first, like maybe formaldehyde (but not sure; is that stuff still used in making foam?), but that goes away quickly.Someone mentioned that the arm slots are useless. I found that to be true for side and back sleeping but less so for stomach sleeping.The pillow only works if you keep your head in the center, in the hollow. If you’re sleeping with someone this makes it harder to snuggle up to them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't sleep with out this pillow!
reviews.reviewText: Bought one months ago, when none of the pillows I found in store could help with my neck pain. Worked like a dream. So comfortable and solved my neck pain! My new dog chewed it and I nearly cried. Slept on a regular pillow for two nights and couldn't get any rest, I was so uncomfortable. I just bought this replacement and slept like a baby last night. So grateful to have this again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great support, very comfy, slits for the arms are useless though
reviews.reviewText: After reading the reviews I didn't know what to expect, but I didn't need to "get used" to it at all, slept great from the first night. Great neck support and comfort, the only downside is that the material gets quite hot so I don't recommend this for the summer unless you're one of those people who don't sweat. It's also a good thing that unlike other listings, this one doesn't advertise the pillow being used to sleep face-down, because the "hollow" center isn't really hollow, it's just a dip for your head to go, if you try to sleep face down on the memory foam you will be smothered.The little lips or slits on the sides (I don't know what to call them) are useless though, they're not long enough to hold or trap your arms in any way so they eventually just fall off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's uncomfortable. You have to get used to it. It takes a long while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wasn’t sure I will be satisfied with this pillow but I am. Soft enough but firm enough. I have arthritis on my neck and was using a brand that help me a lot but it felt to hard. This is the perfect shape and level of softness for me. I just wish the area made in where I assume your arms could go were a little wider. Pillow is not small is medium size. I would like it just a little bit wider.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for your neck
reviews.reviewText: These work great for back sleeping! I wouldn't get this for side sleepers. It took away the pain.
